mapper.sql: ID, SERVICECODE, FOODKIND, SERVICEPRICE, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, MERCHANTCODE, SERROTYPEN, SERROTYPENCODE, AGMATYPRN, AGMATYPRNCODE, DISTANCE, SERVICEUNIT, FOODKINDCODE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM (ID, SERVICECODE, FOODKIND, SERVICEPRICE, CREATEDONUTC, CREATOR, ISAUDIT, ISDELETED, MODIFIER, UPDATEDONUTC, CREATORDEPTCODE, MERCHANTCODE, SERROTYPEN, SERROTYPENCODE, AGMATYPRN, AGMATYPRNCODE, DISTANCE, SERVICEUNIT, FOODKINDCODE) values (SEQ_ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM.Nextval, #{servicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceprice,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{createdonutc}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedonutc}, #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serrotypen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serrotypencode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agmatyprn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agmatyprncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodkindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM
ID,
SERVICECODE,
FOODKIND,
SERVICEPRICE,
CREATEDONUTC,
CREATOR,
ISAUDIT,
ISDELETED,
MODIFIER,
UPDATEDONUTC,
CREATORDEPTCODE,
MERCHANTCODE,
SERROTYPEN,
SERROTYPENCODE,
AGMATYPRN,
AGMATYPRNCODE,
DISTANCE,
SERVICEUNIT,
FOODKINDCODE,
SEQ_ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM.Nextval,
#{servicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{foodkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serviceprice,jdbcType=FLOAT},
#{createdonutc},
#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedonutc},

#{serrotypen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM
SERVICECODE = #{servicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOODKIND = #{foodkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICEPRICE = #{serviceprice,jdbcType=FLOAT},
CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc},
CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANTCODE = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERROTYPEN = #{serrotypen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERROTYPENCODE = #{serrotypencode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGMATYPRN = #{agmatyprn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGMATYPRNCODE = #{agmatyprncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTANCE = #{distance,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVICEUNIT = #{serviceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOODKINDCODE = #{foodkindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM set SERVICECODE = #{servicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODKIND = #{foodkind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICEPRICE = #{serviceprice,jdbcType=FLOAT}, CREATEDONUTC = #{createdonutc}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISAUDIT = #{isaudit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDONUTC = #{updatedonutc}, CREATORDEPTCODE = #{creatordeptcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANTCODE = #{merchantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERROTYPEN = #{serrotypen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERROTYPENCODE = #{serrotypencode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGMATYPRN = #{agmatyprn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGMATYPRNCODE = #{agmatyprncode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTANCE = #{distance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICEUNIT = #{serviceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODKINDCODE = #{foodkindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from (select a.TITLE,a.FARMNUM,a.MERCHANTCODE,a.SERVICEPRICE, a.SERVICEUNIT,rownum row_num from (SELECT (to_number(f.USERLNG)-to_number(f.LNG))*(to_number(f.USERLNG)-to_number(f.LNG))+ (to_number(f.USERLAT)-to_number(f.LAT))*(to_number(f.USERLAT)-to_number(f.LAT)) distance, (f.SERVICETYPE||f.AGMATYPRN||' - '||f.MERCHANTNAME) TITLE, f.MERCHANTNAME, f.MERCHANTCODE, f.AGMATYPRN, f.SERVICETYPE, f.FARMNUM, f.SERVICEPRICE, f.SERVICEUNIT FROM( SELECT c.LNG, c.LAT, c.MERCHANTNAME, c.MERCHANTCODE, d.AGMATYPRN, d.SERVICETYPE, d.SERVICEPRICE, d.SERVICEUNIT, e.FARMNUM, (SELECT b.LNG FROM ZLNF_COOPUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_COOPINFO b ON a.COOPCODE=b.COOPCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode}) userlng, (SELECT b.LAT FROM ZLNF_COOPUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_COOPINFO b ON a.COOPCODE=b.COOPCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode}) userlat FROM ZLNF_FARMMACHINEYMERCHANT c INNER JOIN ZLNF_SERVICEPROGRAM d ON c.MERCHANTCODE=d.MERCHANTCODE INNER JOIN ZLNF_FARMSERVICEMACHINEY e ON d.SERVICECODE=e.SERVICECODE WHERE c.PROVICE=(SELECT b.PROVICE FROM ZLNF_COOPUSER a INNER JOIN ZLNF_COOPINFO b ON a.COOPCODE=b.COOPCODE WHERE a.USERCODE=#{usercode}) ) f ORDER BY distance ASC) a ) b where b.row_num between 1+10*(to_number(#{number})-1) and 10+10*(to_number(#{number})-1)
